Uses of Interface
agents.org.apache.commons.math.optimization.RealConvergenceChecker

  • Packages that use RealConvergenceChecker 
    Package Description
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.optimization
    This package provides common interfaces for the optimization algorithms provided in sub-packages.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.optimization.direct
    This package provides optimization algorithms that don't require derivatives.
    agents.org.apache.commons.math.optimization.general
    This package provides optimization algorithms that require derivatives.

      class  SimpleRealPointChecker
      Simple implementation of the RealConvergenceChecker interface using only point coordinates.
      class  SimpleScalarValueChecker
      Simple implementation of the RealConvergenceChecker interface using only objective function values.
